meanings.definition: A person who fits or adjusts something
meanings.sent1: The fitters worked hard to adjust the machine for smooth operation.
meanings.sent2: She is a skilled fitters who can tailor clothes perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The fitters tried to fit a square peg into a round hole, but it didn't work!
meanings.sent4: His expertise as a fitters allowed him to seamlessly integrate the new software.
meanings.sent5: The fitters meticulously adjusted each piece to ensure a perfect fit.

meanings.definition: A piece of clothing that fits well
meanings.sent1: She found the perfect fitters for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: The dress she wore was a beautiful fitters that accentuated her figure.
meanings.sent3: The fitters she bought online turned out to be too tight around the waist!
meanings.sent4: The fitters hugged her body like a second skin, making her feel confident.
meanings.sent5: The tailor recommended a fitters that would flatter her shape.

meanings.definition: A device used to connect or join parts together
meanings.sent1: The plumber used a fitters to join the pipes securely.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic needed a special fitters to fix the engine.
meanings.sent3: The fitters he bought from the store was too small for the project.
meanings.sent4: The fitters acted as the missing link, completing the assembly perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The sturdy fitters held the structure together even in strong winds.
